item.title: How to Succeed When Working Remotely - Lessons Learned from Chinese Buffets
item.description: Working from home can be an amazingly fulfilling career experience. Likewise, a trip to your local Chinese food buffet can be a culinary delight. But both can also be abjectly horrible. Here is my breakdown on how to succeed at working remotely without the debilitating pains of post-dumpling bloat. Dress the part I am a great defender of Chinese food buffets. I know the food is not some five star affair, but damn it, I like it.
